meta.title: Noman Farooq - Senior Mobile Applications Engineer (Android)
meta.description: Resume of Noman Farooq - Senior Android Engineer with 4+ years of experience in Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose and scalable mobile app development.
meta.keywords: Noman Farooq, Android Engineer, Senior Mobile Developer, Kotlin, Lahore, Resume, Portfolio

social.ogTitle: Noman Farooq - Senior Mobile Applications Engineer
social.ogDescription: 4+ years of experience in Android| Built apps with 10M+ downloads | Expert in Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, Firebase

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content:
Results-driven software engineer with over 4+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software application. Skilled in utilizing programming languages and engineering principles to solve
complex problems efficiently. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure software aligns with user needs and business objectives. Committed to staying updated with emerging technologies and following best practices throughout the software development lifecycle.

achievements: Designed and developed software applications per project specifications.
Wrote clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
Performed unit testing and debugging to ensure software quality.
Implemented best practices for code review and version control.
Collaborated with engineers to architect and maintain software systems.
Stayed updated with emerging technologies and industry trends.
Troubleshot technical issues and provided timely solutions.
Contributed to project planning and estimation.
Develop and maintain high-performance Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
Stay updated with the latest Android trends and integrate them into projects.
Optimize application performance through profiling and refactoring techniques.
Mentor junior developers and lead technical discussions within the team.
Integrate third-party APIs and services to extend application capabilities.
Analyze user data to inform feature development and improve app engagement.
Use data-driven insights to refine features and boost user engagement.
Keep up with the latest Android advancements and integrate them into projects.
Engage in agile ceremonies, contributing to sprint planning and retrospectives

items.name: B Infinite – Rewards & Loyalty App
items.description: Developed the B Infinite app to deliver a dynamic rewards and loyalty experience across Malaysia. By partnering with renowned brands like Caltex, Starbucks, and Krispy Kreme, the app allows users to earn BPoints for every RM1 spent—except at Caltex where points are earned per litre of petrol purchased. Users can accumulate points through shopping, dining, and exploring, then redeem them for fuel, coffee, doughnuts, shoes, home appliances, bill payments, and exclusive deals in the BI Shop. The app is designed for both residents and non-residents aged 18 and above, ensuring that everyone can enjoy snazzy deals and instant rewards.

items.name: GoRide Driver – City-to-City Ride-Sharing App
items.description: Go Ride is an easy-to-use app that allows drivers to offer affordable city-to-city rides. With the shared ride feature, drivers can pick up multiple passengers, making the journey more efficient and profitable.

items.name: JSC Booking
items.description: The JSC Transport app is your ultimate solution for all your transportation needs, whether you require immediate transport or are planning for future trips, including your sacred Umrah journey. With our user-friendly interface, you can effortlessly book reliable and comfortable transport at your convenience.

items.name: JSC Driver
items.description: Our Transport Management App revolutionizes the way you handle bookings and logistics. Designed for efficiency and ease-of-use, it simplifies the process of booking transport services, managing schedules, and ensuring seamless coordination for both immediate and future travel needs. Whether you're planning a trip, organizing group travel, or booking for Umrah services, our app offers a comprehensive solution. Enjoy real-time updates, secure transactions, and personalized service options, all at your fingertips. Embrace a new standard in transport management with our innovative app

items.name: Design Studio For Cricuts
items.description: Design Studio for Cricut Machine, a feature-rich Android application designed for craft enthusiasts to create stunning DIY projects with ease. From personalized gifts and intricate paper crafts to vinyl projects and home décor, this app offers an intuitive interface, advanced editing tools, and a vast image library to enhance the crafting experience. With project inspiration, step-by-step tutorials, and community sharing features, it empowers users to bring their creative ideas to life.
